title: Cheating Spouse
overview: Cheating Spouse highlights "honest" which is one of the most important values in a marriage. When a partner cheats on him, it will eventually destroy the family. The story revolves around two unworthy couples â€“ a flirtatious social woman and her perfect husband and a sickly but optimistic woman and her ambitious husband who will do anything to succeed. The story gets complicated when they get involved with a love triangle. Will pity turn into love?
